GSP34patyogbu:1: yas tyaktvā rūpam ādyaṃ prabhavati jagato 'nekadhānugrahāya prakṣīṇakleśarāśir viṣamaviṣadharo 'nekavaktraḥ subhogī /
GSP34patyogbu:2: sarvajñānaprasūtir bhujagaparikaraḥ prītaye yasya nityaṃ devo 'hīśaḥ sa vo 'vyāt sitavimalatanur yogado yogayuktaḥ //1//
GSP34patyogbu:4: athety ayam adhikārārthaḥ. yogānuśāsanaṃ śāstram adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam. yogaḥ samādhiḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:5: sa ca sārvabhaumaś cittasya dharmaḥ. kṣiptaṃ mūḍhaṃ vikṣiptam ekāgraṃ niruddham iti
GSP34patyogbu:6: cittabhūmayaḥ. tatra vikṣipte cetasi vikṣepopasarjanībhūtaḥ samādhir na yogapakṣe
GSP34patyogbu:7: vartate. yas tv ekāgre cetasi sadbhūtam arthaṃ pradyotayati kṣiṇoti ca kleśān karmabandhanāni
GSP34patyogbu:8: ślathayati nirodham abhimukhaṃ karoti sa saṃprajñāto yoga ity ākhyāyate. sa ca vitarkānugato
GSP34patyogbu:9: vicārānugata ānandānugato 'smitānugata ity upariṣṭān nivedayiṣyāmaḥ. sarvavṛttinirodhe
GSP34patyogbu:13: sarvaśabdāgrahaṇāt saṃprajñāto 'pi yoga ity ākhyāyate. cittaṃ hi prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlatvāt triguṇam.
GSP34patyogbu:14: prakhyārūpaṃ hi cittasattvaṃ rajastamobhyāṃ saṃsṛṣṭam aiśvaryaviṣayapriyaṃ bhavati.
GSP34patyogbu:15: tad eva tamasānuviddham adharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśvaryopagaṃ bhavati. tad eva prakṣīṇamohāvaraṇaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:16: sarvataḥ pradyotamānam anuviddhaṃ rajomātrayā dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryopagaṃ bhavati.
GSP34patyogbu:17: tad eva rajoleśamalāpetaṃ svarūpapratiṣṭhaṃ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātraṃ dharmameghadhyānopagaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:18: bhavati. tat paraṃ prasaṃkhyānam ity ācakṣate dhyāyinaḥ. citiśaktir apariṇāminy apratisaṃkramā
GSP34patyogbu:19: darśitaviṣayā śuddhā cānantā ca sattvaguṇātmikā ceyam ato viparītā vivekakhyātir
GSP34patyogbu:20: iti. atas tasyāṃ viraktaṃ cittaṃ tām api khyātiṃ niruṇaddhi. tadavasthaṃ saṃskāropagaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:21: bhavati. sa nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ. na tatra kiṃcit saṃprajñāyata ity asaṃprajñātaḥ. dvividhaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:23: tadavasthe cetasi viṣayābhāvād buddhibodhātmā puruṣaḥ kiṃsvabhāva iti ---
GSP34patyogbu:25: svarūpapratiṣṭhā tadānīṃ citiśaktir yathā kaivalye. vyutthānacitte tu sati tathāpi bhavantī na tathā. 1.3
GSP34patyogbu:29: vyutthāne yāś cittavṛttayas tadaviśiṣṭavṛttiḥ puruṣaḥ. tathā ca sūtram ekam eva darśanaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:30: khyātir eva darśanam iti. cittam ayaskāntamaṇikalpaṃ saṃnidhimātropakāri dṛśyatvena
GSP34patyogbu:31: svaṃ bhavati puruṣasya svāminaḥ. tasmāc cittavṛttibodhe puruṣasyānādiḥ saṃbandho hetuḥ. 1.4
GSP34patyogbu:32: tāḥ punar niroddhavyā bahutve sati cittasya ---
GSP34patyogbu:34: kleśahetukāḥ karmāśayapracaye kṣetrībhūtāḥ kliṣṭāḥ. khyātiviṣayā guṇādhikāravirodhinyo
GSP34patyogbu:35: 'kliṣṭāḥ. kliṣṭapravāhapatitā apy akliṣṭāḥ. kliṣṭacchidreṣv apy akliṣṭā bhavanti.
GSP34patyogbu:36: akliṣṭacchideṣu kliṣṭā iti. tathājātīyakāḥ saṃskārā vṛttibhir eva kriyante. saṃskāraiś
GSP34patyogbu:37: ca vṛttaya iti. evaṃ vṛttisaṃskāracakram aniśam āvartate. tad evaṃbhūtaṃ cittam avasitādhikāram
GSP34patyogbu:38: ātmakalpena vyavatiṣṭhate pralayaṃ vā gacchatīti. tāḥ kliṣṭāś cākliṣṭāś ca pañcadhā vṛttayaḥ. 1.5
GSP34patyogbu:42: viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānā vṛttiḥ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam. phalam aviśiṣṭaḥ pauruṣeyaś cittavṛttibodhaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:44: anumeyasya tulyajātīyeṣv anuvṛtto bhinnajātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ saṃbandho yas tadviṣayā
GSP34patyogbu:45: sāmānyāvadhāraṇapradhānā vṛttir anumānam. yathā deśāntaraprāpter gatimac candratārakaṃ caitravat,
GSP34patyogbu:46: vindhyaś cāprāptir agatiḥ. āptena dṛṣṭo 'numito vārthaḥ paratra svabodhasaṃkrāntaye śabdenopadiśyate,
GSP34patyogbu:47: śabdāt tadarthaviṣayā vṛttiḥ śrotur āgamaḥ. yasyāśraddheyārtho vaktā na dṛṣṭānumitārthaḥ sa āgamaḥ plavate. mūlavaktari tu dṛṣṭānumitārthe nirviplavaḥ syāt. 1.7
GSP34patyogbu:49: sa kasmān na pramāṇam. yataḥ pramāṇena bādhyate. bhūtārthaviṣayatvāt pramāṇasya.
GSP34patyogbu:50: tatra pramāṇena bādhanam apramāṇasya dṛṣṭam. tadyathā dvicandradarśanaṃ sadviṣayeṇaikacandradarśanena
GSP34patyogbu:51: bādhyata iti. seyaṃ pañcaparvā bhavaty avidyā. avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśā
GSP34patyogbu:52: iti. eta eva svasaṃjñābhis tamo moho mahāmohas tāmisro 'ndhatāmisra iti. ete cittamalaprasaṅgenābhidhāsyante. 1.8
GSP34patyogbu:54: sa na pramāṇopārohī. na viparyayopārohī ca. vastuśūnyatve 'pi śabdajñānamāhātmyanibandhano
GSP34patyogbu:55: vyavahāro dṛśyate. tad yathā caitanyaṃ puruṣasya svarūpam iti. yadā citir eva puruṣas
GSP34patyogbu:57: bhavati ca vyapadeśe vṛttiḥ. yathā caitrasya gaur iti. tathā pratiṣiddhavastudharmo niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:58: tiṣṭhati bāṇaḥ sthāsyati sthita iti. gatinivṛttau dhātvarthamātraṃ gamyate. tathānutpattidharmā puruṣa iti,
GSP34patyogbu:59: utpattidharmasyābhāvamātram avagamyate na puruṣānvayī dharmaḥ. tasmād vikalpitaḥ sa dharmas tena cāsti vyavahāra iti. 1.9
GSP34patyogbu:61: sā ca saṃprabodhe pratyavamarśāt pratyayaviśeṣaḥ. katham,
GSP34patyogbu:62: sukham aham asvāpsam. prasannaṃ me manaḥ. prajñāṃ me viśāradīkaroti. duḥkham aham
GSP34patyogbu:63: asvāpsam. styānaṃ me mano bhramaty anavasthitam gāḍhaṃ mūḍho 'ham asvāpsam. gurūṇi
GSP34patyogbu:64: me gātrāṇi. klāntaṃ me cittam. alasaṃ muṣitam iva tiṣṭhatīti. sa khalv ayaṃ prabuddhasya
GSP34patyogbu:65: pratyavamarśo na syād asati pratyayānubhave tadāśritāḥ smṛtayś ca tadviṣayā na syuḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:66: tasmāt pratyayaviśeṣo nidrā. sā ca samādhāv itarapratyayavan niroddhavyeti. 1.10
GSP34patyogbu:68: kiṃ pratyayasya cittaṃ smaraty āhosvid viṣayasyeti. grāhyoparaktaḥ pratyayo grāhyagrahaṇobhayākāranirbhāsas
GSP34patyogbu:69: tajjātīyakaṃ saṃskāram ārabhate. sa saṃskāraḥ svavyañjakāñjanas tadākārām eva grāhyagrahaṇobhayātmikāṃ smṛtiṃ janayati.
GSP34patyogbu:70: tatra grahaṇākārapūrvā buddhiḥ. grāhyākārapūrvā smṛtiḥ. sā ca dvayī --- bhāvitasmartavyā
GSP34patyogbu:71: cābhāvitasmartavyā ca. svapne bhāvitasmartavyā. jāgratsamaye tv abhāvitasmartavyeti.
GSP34patyogbu:72: sarvāḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtīnām anubhavāt prabhavanti. sarvāś
GSP34patyogbu:73: caitā vṛttayaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmikāḥ. sukhaduḥkhamohāś ca kleśeṣu vyākhyeyāḥ. sukhānuśayī
GSP34patyogbu:74: rāgaḥ. duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ. mohaḥ punar avidyeti. etāḥ sarvā vṛttayo niroddhavyāḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:75: āsāṃ nirodhe saṃprajñāto vā samādhir bhavaty asaṃprajñāto veti. 1.11
GSP34patyogbu:78: cittanadī nāmobhayatovāhinī vahati kalyāṇāya vahati pāpāya ca. yā tu kaivalyaprāgbhārā
GSP34patyogbu:79: vivekaviṣayanimnā sā kalyāṇavahā. saṃsāraprāgbhārāvivekaviṣayaniṃnā pāpavahā. tatra
GSP34patyogbu:80: vairāgyeṇa viṣayasrotaḥ khilīkriyate. vivekadarśanābhyāsena vivekasrota udghāṭyata
GSP34patyogbu:83: cittasyāvṛttikasya praśāntavāhitā sthitiḥ. tadarthaḥ prayatno vīryam utsāhaḥ. tat saṃpipādayiṣayā tat sādhanānuṣṭhānam abhyāsaḥ. 1.13
GSP34patyogbu:85: dīrghakālāsevito nirantarāsevitaḥ satkārāsevitaḥ. tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vidyayā śraddhayā
GSP34patyogbu:86: ca saṃpāditaḥ satkāravān dṛḍhabhūmir bhavati. vyutthānasaṃskāreṇa drāg ity evānabhibhūtaviṣaya ity arthaḥ. 1.14
GSP34patyogbu:88: striyo 'nnapānam aiśvaryam iti dṛṣṭaviṣaye vitṛṣṇasya svargavaidehyaprakṛtilayatvaprāptāv
GSP34patyogbu:93: guṇebhyo vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyo virakta iti. tad dvayaṃ vairāgyam. tatra yad uttaraṃ
GSP34patyogbu:94: taj jñānaprasādamātram. yasyodaye sati yogī pratyuditakhyātir evaṃ manyate --- prāptaṃ prāpaṇīyaṃ,
GSP34patyogbu:97: yasyāvicchedāj janitvā mriyate mṛtvā ca jāyata iti. jñānasyaiva parā kāṣṭhā vairāgyam. etasyaiva hi nāntarīyakaṃ kaivalyam iti. 1.16
GSP34patyogbu:98: athopāyadvayena niruddhacittavṛtteḥ katham ucyate saṃprajñātaḥ samādhir iti ---
GSP34patyogbu:100: vitarkaś cittasyālambane sthūla ābhogaḥ. sūkṣmo vicāraḥ. ānando hlādaḥ. ekātmikā
GSP34patyogbu:101: saṃvid asmitā. tatra prathamaś catuṣṭayānugataḥ samādhiḥ savitarkaḥ. dvitīyo vitarkavikalaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:102: savicāraḥ. tṛtīyo vicāravikalaḥ sānandaḥ. caturthas tadvikalo 'smitāmātra iti. sarva
GSP34patyogbu:106: sarvavṛttipratyastamaye saṃskāraśeṣo nirodhaś cittasya samādhir asaṃprajñātaḥ. tasya
GSP34patyogbu:107: paraṃ vairāgyam upāyaḥ. sālambano hy abhyāsas tatsādhanāya na kalpata iti virāmapratyayo
GSP34patyogbu:108: nirvastuka ālambanīkriyate. sa cārthaśūnyaḥ. tadabhyāsapūrvakaṃ hi cittaṃ nirālambanam
GSP34patyogbu:109: abhāvaprāptam iva bhavatīty eṣa nirbījaḥ samādhir asaṃprajñātaḥ. 1.18
GSP34patyogbu:110: sa khalv ayaṃ dvividhaḥ --- upāyapratyayo bhavapratyayaś ca. tatropāyapratyayo yogināṃ bhavati ---
GSP34patyogbu:112: videhānāṃ devānāṃ bhavapratyayaḥ. te hi svasaṃskāramātropayogena cittena kaivalyapadam
GSP34patyogbu:113: ivānubhavantaḥ svasaṃskāravipākaṃ tathājātīyakam ativāhayanti. tathā prakṛtilayāḥ
GSP34patyogbu:115: yāvan na punar āvartate 'dhikāravaśāc cittam iti. 1.19
GSP34patyogbu:117: upāyapratyayo yogināṃ bhavati. śraddhā cetasaḥ saṃprasādaḥ. sā hi jananīva kalyāṇī
GSP34patyogbu:118: yoginaṃ pāti. tasya hi śraddadhānasya vivekārthino vīryam upajāyate. samupajātavīryasya
GSP34patyogbu:119: smṛtir upatiṣṭhate. smṛtyupasthāne ca cittam anākulaṃ samādhīyate. samāhitacittasya
GSP34patyogbu:120: prajñāviveka upāvartate. yena yathārthaṃ vastu jānāti. tadabhyāsāt tattadviṣayāc
GSP34patyogbu:122: te khalu nava yogino mṛdumadhyādhimātropāyā bhavanti. tadyathā --- mṛdūpāyo madhyopāyo
GSP34patyogbu:123: 'dhimātropāya iti. tatra mṛdūpāyas trividhaḥ --- mṛdusaṃvego madhyasaṃvegas tīvrasaṃvega
GSP34patyogbu:124: iti. tathā madhyopāyas tathādhimātropāya iti. tatrādhimātropāyānām ---
GSP34patyogbu:128: mṛdutīvro madhyatīvro 'dhimātratīvra iti. tato 'pi viśeṣaḥ. tadviśeṣād api mṛdutīvrasaṃvegasyāsannaḥ tato madhyatīvrasaṃvegasyāsannataraḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:129: tasmād adhimātratīvrasaṃvegasyādhimātropāyasyāpy āsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṃ ceti. 1.22
GSP34patyogbu:130: kim etasmād evāsannatamaḥ samādhir bhavati. athāsya lābhe bhavaty anyo 'pi kaścid upāyo na veti ---
GSP34patyogbu:132: praṇidhānād bhaktiviśeṣād āvarjita īśvaras tam anugṛhṇāty abhidhyānamātreṇa. tadabhidhyānamātrād api yogina āsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṃ ca bhavatīti. 1.23
GSP34patyogbu:135: avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ. kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi. tatphalaṃ vipākaḥ. tadanuguṇā vāsanā āśayāḥ. te ca manasi vartamānāḥ puruṣe vyapadiśyante,
GSP34patyogbu:136: sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti. yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yoddhṛṣu vartamānaḥ svāmini vyapadiśyate. yo hy anena bhogenāparāmṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣaviśeṣa
GSP34patyogbu:137: kaivalyaṃ prāptās tarhi santi ca bahavaḥ kevalinaḥ. te hi trīṇi bandhanāni cchittvā
GSP34patyogbu:138: kaivalyaṃ prāptā īśvarasya ca tatsaṃbandho na bhūto na bhāvī. yathā muktasya pūrvā
GSP34patyogbu:139: bandhakoṭiḥ prajñāyate naivam īśvarasya. yathā vā prakṛtilīnasyottarā bandhakoṭiḥ
GSP34patyogbu:140: saṃbhāvyate naivam īśvarasya. sa tu sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiveśvara iti.
GSP34patyogbu:141: yo 'sau prakṛṣṭasattvopādānād īśvarasya śāśvatika utkarṣaḥ sa kiṃ sanimitta āhosvin nirnimitta iti. tasya śāstraṃ nimittam.
GSP34patyogbu:144: etayoḥ śāstrotkarṣayor īśvarasattve vartamānayor anādiḥ saṃbandhaḥ. etasmād etad
GSP34patyogbu:145: bhavati sadaiveśvaraḥ sadaiva mukta iti. tac ca tasyaiśvaryaṃ sāmyātiśayavinirmuktam.
GSP34patyogbu:146: na tāvad aiśvaryāntareṇa tad atiśayyate. yad evātiśayi syāt tad eva tat syāt. tasmād
GSP34patyogbu:147: yatra kāṣṭhāprāptir aiśvaryasya sa īśvara iti. na ca tatsamānam aiśvaryam asti. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:148: dvayos tulyayor ekasmin yugapatkāmite 'rthe navam idam astu purāṇam idam astv ity
GSP34patyogbu:149: ekasya siddhāv itarasya prākāmyavighātād ūnatvaṃ prasaktam. dvayoś ca tulyayor yugapatkāmitārthaprāptir
GSP34patyogbu:150: nāsti. arthasya viruddhatvāt. tasmād yasya sāmyātiśayair vinirmuktam aiśvaryaṃ sa
GSP34patyogbu:155: sarvajñabījam etad vivardhamānaṃ yatra niratiśayaṃ sa sarvajñaḥ. asti kāṣṭhāprāptiḥ
GSP34patyogbu:156: sarvajñabījasya sātiśayatvāt parimāṇavad iti. yatra kāṣṭhāprāptir jñānasya sa sarvajñaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:158: sāmānyamātropasaṃhāre ca kṛtopakṣayam anumānaṃ na viśeṣapratipattau samartham iti.
GSP34patyogbu:159: tasya saṃjñādiviśeṣapratipattir āgamataḥ paryanveṣyā. tasyātmānugrahābhāve 'pi bhūtānugrahaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:160: prayojanam. jñānadharmopadeśena kalpapralayamahāpralayeṣu saṃsāriṇaḥ puruṣān uddhariṣyāmīti.
GSP34patyogbu:161: tathā coktam --- ādividvān nirmāṇacittam adhiṣṭhāya kāruṇyād bhagavān paramarṣir
GSP34patyogbu:165: pūrve hi guravaḥ kālenāvacchidyante. yatrāvacchedārthena kālo nopāvartate sa eṣa
GSP34patyogbu:166: pūrveṣām api guruḥ. yathāsya sargasyādau prakarṣagatyā siddhas tathātikrāntasargādiṣv
GSP34patyogbu:169: vācya īśvaraḥ praṇavasya. kim asya saṃketakṛtaṃ vācyavācakatvam atha pradīpaprakāśavad avasthitam iti.
GSP34patyogbu:170: sthito 'sya vācyasya vācakena saha saṃbandhaḥ. saṃketas tv īśravasya sthitam evārtham abhinayati. yathāvasthitaḥ pitṛputrayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃketenāvadyotyate,
GSP34patyogbu:172: ayam asya putra iti. sargāntareṣv api vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣas tathaiva saṃketaḥ kriyate. saṃpratipattinityatayā nityaḥ śabdārthasaṃbandha ity āgaminaḥ pratijānate. 1.27
GSP34patyogbu:175: praṇavasya japaḥ praṇavābhidheyasya ceśvarasya bhāvanam. tad asya yoginaḥ praṇavaṃ japataḥ praṇavārthaṃ ca bhāvayataś cittam ekāgraṃ saṃpadyate. tathā coktam ---
GSP34patyogbu:180: ye tāvad antarāyā vyādhiprabhṛtayas te tāvad īśvarapraṇidhānān na bhavanti. svarūpadarśanam
GSP34patyogbu:181: apy asya bhavati. yathaiveśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ prasannaḥ kevalo 'nupasargas tathāyam
GSP34patyogbu:182: api buddheḥ pratisaṃvedī yaḥ puruṣas tam adhigacchati. 1.29
GSP34patyogbu:183: atha ke 'ntarāyā ye cittasya vikṣepāḥ. ke punas te kiyanto veti ---
GSP34patyogbu:185: navāntarāyāś cittasya vikṣepāḥ. sahaite cittavṛttibhir bhavanti. eteṣām abhāve na
GSP34patyogbu:186: bhavanti pūrvoktāś cittavṛttayaḥ. vyādhir dhāturasakaraṇavaiṣamyam. styānam akarmaṇyatā
GSP34patyogbu:187: cittasya. saṃśaya ubhayakoṭispṛg vijñānaṃ syād idam evaṃ naivaṃ syād iti. pramādaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:188: samādhisādhanānām abhāvanam. ālasyaṃ kāyasya cittasya ca gurutvād apravṛttiḥ. aviratiś
GSP34patyogbu:189: cittasya viṣayasaṃprayogātmā gardhaḥ. bhrāntidarśanaṃ viparyayajñānam. alabdhabhūmikatvaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:190: samādhibhūmer alābhaḥ. anavasthitatvaṃ yal labdhāyāṃ bhūmau cittasyāpratiṣṭhā. samādhipratilambhe
GSP34patyogbu:191: hi sati tadavasthitaṃ syād iti. ete cittavikṣepā nava yogamalā yogapratipakṣā yogāntarāyā

GSP34patyogbu:275: ity eteṣāṃ vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ. tatra samāpannasya yogino yo gavādyarthaḥ samādhiprajñāyāṃ
GSP34patyogbu:276: samārūḍhaḥ sa cec chabdārthajñānavikalpānuviddha upāvartate sā saṃkīrṇā samāpattiḥ

GSP34patyogbu:298: etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā // YS_1.44 //

GSP34patyogbu:344: tataś ca saṃskārā iti. katham asau saṃskārātiśayaś cittaṃ sādhikāraṃ na kariṣyatīti.

GSP34patyogbu:346: cittaṃ hi te svakāryād avasādayanti. khyātiparyavasānaṃ hi cittaceṣṭitam iti. 1.50

GSP34patyogbu:365: sa hy āsevyamānaḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayati kleśāṃś ca pratanūkaroti. pratanūkṛtān kleśān

GSP34patyogbu:367: punaḥ kleśair aparāmṛṣṭā sattvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātiḥ sūkṣmā prajñā samāptādhikārā

GSP34patyogbu:378: ālambane saṃmukhībhāvaḥ. prasaṃkhyānavato dagdhakleśabījasya saṃmukhībhūte 'py ālambane nāsau punar asti,

GSP34patyogbu:381: dagdham iti viṣayasya saṃmukhībhāve 'pi sati na bhavaty eṣāṃ prabodha ity uktā prasuptir
GSP34patyogbu:383: tanutvam ucyate --- pratipakṣabhāvanopahatāḥ kleśās tanavo bhavanti. tathā vicchidya vicchidya tena tenātmanā punaḥ punaḥ samudācarantīti vicchinnāḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:384: rāgakāle krodhasyādarśanāt. na hi rāgakāle krodhaḥ samudācarati. rāgaś ca kvacid dṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāsti. naikasyāṃ striyāṃ caitro rakta ity anyāsu strīṣu viraktaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:385: kiṃtu tatra rāgo labdhavṛttir anyatra tu bhaviṣyadvṛttir iti. sa hi tadā prasuptatanuvicchinno bhavati.
GSP34patyogbu:386: viṣaye yo labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāraḥ. sarva evaite kleśaviṣayatvaṃ nātikrāmanti. kas tarhi vicchinnaḥ prasuptas tanur udāro vā kleśa iti,
GSP34patyogbu:388: kiṃtu viśiṣṭānām evaiteṣāṃ vicchinnāditvam. yathaiva pratipakṣabhāvanāto nivṛttas tathaiva svavyañjakāñjanenābhivyakta iti. sarva evāmī kleśā avidyābhedāḥ. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:389: sarveṣv avidyaivābhiplavate. yad avidyayā vastv ākāryate tad evānuśerate kleśā viparyāsapratyayakāla upalabhyante kṣīyamāṇāṃ cāvidyām anu kṣīyanta iti. 2.4
GSP34patyogbu:392: anitye kārye nityakhyātiḥ. tadyathā --- dhruvā pṛthivī,
GSP34patyogbu:394: amṛtā divaukasa iti. tathāśucau paramabībhatse kāye, ---
GSP34patyogbu:396: kāyam ādheyaśaucatvāt paṇḍitā hy aśuciṃ viduḥ” //
GSP34patyogbu:397: iti aśucau śucikhyātir dṛśyate. naveva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṃ kanyā madhvamṛtāvayavanirmiteva candraṃ bhittvā niḥsṛteva jñāyate,
GSP34patyogbu:398: nīlotpalapatrāyatākṣī hāvagarbhābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ jīvalokam āśvāsayantīveti kasya
GSP34patyogbu:399: kenābhisaṃbandhaḥ. bhavati caivam aśucau śuciviparyāsapratyaya iti. etenāpuṇye puṇyapratyayas
GSP34patyogbu:402: ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ” iti. tatra sukhakhyātir avidyā. tathānātmany ātmakhyātir
GSP34patyogbu:403: bāhyopakaraṇeṣu cetanācetaneṣu bhogādhiṣṭhāne vā śarīre puruṣopakaraṇe vā manasy
GSP34patyogbu:404: anātmany ātmakhyātir iti. tathaitad atroktam --- “vyaktam avyaktaṃ vā sattvam ātmatvenābhipratītya
GSP34patyogbu:405: tasya saṃpadam anu nandaty ātmasaṃpadaṃ manvānas tasya vyāpadam anu śocaty ātmavyāpadaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:406: manvānaḥ sa sarvo 'pratibuddhaḥ” iti. eṣā catuṣpadā bhavaty avidyā mūlam asya kleśasaṃtānasya
GSP34patyogbu:408: tasyāś cāmitrāgoṣpadavadvastusatattvaṃ vijñeyam. yathā nāmitro mitrābhāvo na mitramātraṃ
GSP34patyogbu:409: kiṃtu tadviruddhaḥ sapatnaḥ. yathā vāgoṣpadaṃ na goṣpadābhāvo na goṣpadamātraṃ kiṃtu
GSP34patyogbu:410: deśa eva tābhyām anyad vastvantaram. evam avidyā na pramāṇaṃ na pramāṇābhāvaḥ kiṃtu
GSP34patyogbu:413: puruṣo dṛkśaktir buddhir darśanaśaktir ity etayor ekasvarūpāpattir ivāsmitā kleśa
GSP34patyogbu:415: iva satyāṃ bhogaḥ kalpate. svarūpapratilambhe tu tayoḥ kaivalyam eva bhavati kuto
GSP34patyogbu:416: bhoga iti. tathā coktam --- “buddhitaḥ paraṃ puruṣam ākāraśīlavidyādibhir vibhaktam
GSP34patyogbu:419: sukhābhijñasya sukhānusmṛtipūrvaḥ sukhe tatsādhane vā yo gardhas tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ sa rāga iti. 2.7
GSP34patyogbu:421: duḥkhābhijñasya duḥkhānusmṛtipūrvo duḥkhe tatsādhane vā yaḥ pratigho manyur jighāṃsā krodhaḥ sa dveṣaḥ. 2.8
GSP34patyogbu:423: sarvasya prāṇina iyam ātmāśīr nityā bhavati mā na bhūvaṃ bhūyāsam iti. na cānanubhūtamaraṇadharmakasyaiṣā
GSP34patyogbu:424: bhavaty ātmāśīḥ. etayā ca pūrvajanmānubhavaḥ pratīyate. sa cāyam abhiniveśaḥ kleśaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:425: svarasavāhī kṛmer api jātamātrasya pratyakṣānumānāgamair asaṃbhāvito maraṇatrāsa
GSP34patyogbu:427: yathā cāyam atyantamūḍheṣu dṛśyate kleśas tathā viduṣo 'pi vijñātapūrvāparāntasya rūḍhaḥ. kasmāt samānā hi tayoḥ kuśalākuśalayor maraṇaduḥkhānubhavād iyaṃ vāsaneti. 2.9
GSP34patyogbu:429: te pañca kleśā dagdhabījakalpā yoginaś caritādhikāre cetasi pralīne saha tenaivāstaṃ gacchanti. 2.10
GSP34patyogbu:432: kleśānāṃ yā vṛttayaḥ sthūlās tāḥ kriyāyogena tanūkṛtāḥ satyaḥ prasaṃkhyānena dhyānena
GSP34patyogbu:433: hātavyā yāvat sūkṣmīkṛtā yāvad dagdhabījakalpā iti. yathā vastrāṇāṃ sthūlo malaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:434: pūrvaṃ nirdhūyate paścāt sūkṣmo yatnenopāyena cāpanīyate tathā svalpapratipakṣāḥ
GSP34patyogbu:438: tatra puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayaḥ kāmalobhamohakrodhabhavaḥ. sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaś cādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaś
GSP34patyogbu:439: ca. tatra tīvrasaṃvegena mantratapaḥsamādhibhir nirvartita īśvaradevatāmaharṣimahānubhāvānām
GSP34patyogbu:440: ārādhanād vā yaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ sa sadyaḥ paripacyate puṇyakarmāśaya iti. tathā tīvrakleśena
GSP34patyogbu:441: bhītavyādhitakṛpaṇeṣu viśvāsopagateṣu vā mahānubhāveṣu vā tapasviṣu kṛtaḥ punaḥ punar
GSP34patyogbu:442: apakāraḥ sa cāpi pāpakarmāśayaḥ sadya eva paripacyate. yathā nandīśvaraḥ kumāro manuṣyapariṇāmaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:443: hitvā devatvena pariṇataḥ. tathā nahuṣo 'pi devānām indraḥ svakaṃ pariṇāmaṃ hitvā
GSP34patyogbu:444: tiryaktvena pariṇata iti. tatra nārakāṇāṃ nāsti dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśayaḥ. kṣīṇakleśānām
GSP34patyogbu:447: satsu kleśeṣu karmāśayo vipākārambhī bhavati nocchinnakleśamūlaḥ. yathā tuṣāvanaddhāḥ śālitaṇḍulā adagdhabījabhāvāḥ prarohasamarthā bhavanti,
GSP34patyogbu:448: nāpanītatuṣā dagdhabījabhāvā vā tathā kleśāvanaddhaḥ karmāśayo vipākaprarohī bhavati,
GSP34patyogbu:449: nāpanītakleśo na prasaṃkhyānadagdhakleśabījabhāvo veti. sa ca vipākas trividho jātir āyur bhoga iti.
GSP34patyogbu:450: tatredaṃ vicāryate --- kim ekaṃ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam athaikaṃ karmānekaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:451: janmākṣipatīti. dvitīyā vicāraṇā --- kim anekaṃ karmānekaṃ janma nirvartayati athānekaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:452: karmaikaṃ janma nirvartayatīti. na tāvad ekaṃ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:453: anādikālapracitasyāsaṃkhyeyasyāvaśiṣṭasya karmaṇaḥ sāṃpratikasya ca phalakramāniyamād anāśvāso lokasya prasaktaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:454: sa cāniṣṭa iti. na caikaṃ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:455: anekeṣu karmasu ekaikam eva karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam ity avaśiṣṭasya vipākakālābhāvaḥ prasaktaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:456: sa cāpy aniṣṭa iti. na cānekaṃ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:457: tad anekaṃ janma yugapan na saṃbhavatīti krameṇaiva vācyam. tathā ca pūrvadoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:458: tasmāj janmaprāyaṇāntare kṛtaḥ puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayapracayo vicitraḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvasthitaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:459: prāyaṇābhivyakta ekapraghaṭṭakena maraṇaṃ prasādhya saṃmūrchita ekam eva janma karoti.
GSP34patyogbu:460: tac ca janma tenaiva karmaṇā labdhāyuṣkaṃ bhavati. tasminn āyuṣi tenaiva karmaṇā
GSP34patyogbu:461: bhogaḥ saṃpadyata iti. asau karmāśayo janmāyurbhogahetutvāt trivipāko 'bhidhīyata
GSP34patyogbu:462: iti. ata ekabhavikaḥ karmāśaya ukta iti.
GSP34patyogbu:463: dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyas tv ekavipākārambhī bhogahetutvād dvivipākārambhī vāyurbhogahetutvān
GSP34patyogbu:464: nandīśvaravan nahuṣavad veti. kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitābhis tu vāsanābhir
GSP34patyogbu:465: anādikālasaṃmūrchitam idaṃ cittaṃ vicitrīkṛtam iva sarvato matsyajālaṃ granthibhir
GSP34patyogbu:466: ivātatam ity etā anekabhavapūrvikā vāsanāḥ. yas tv ayaṃ karmāśaya eṣa evaikabhavika
GSP34patyogbu:467: ukta iti. ye saṃskārāḥ smṛtihetavas tā vāsanās tāś cānādikālīnā iti.
GSP34patyogbu:468: yas tv asāv ekabhavikaḥ karmāśayaḥ sa niyatavipākaś cāniyatavipākaś ca. tatra dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya
GSP34patyogbu:469: niyatavipākasyaivāyaṃ niyamo na tv adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyāniyatavipākasya kasmāt.
GSP34patyogbu:470: yo hy adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyo 'niyatavipākas tasya trayī gatiḥ --- kṛtasyāvipakvasya nāśaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:473: tatra kṛtasyāvipakvasya nāśo yathā śuklakarmodayād ihaiva nāśaḥ kṛṣṇasya. yatredam
GSP34patyogbu:474: uktam --- “dve dve ha vai karmaṇī veditavye pāpakasyaiko rāśiḥ puṇyakṛto 'pahanti
GSP34patyogbu:475: tad icchasva karmāṇi sukṛtāni kartum ihaiva te karma kavayo vedayante.“
GSP34patyogbu:476: pradhānakarmaṇy āvāpagamanam. yatredam uktaṃ --- “syāt svalpaḥ saṃkaraḥ saparihāraḥ sapratyavamarṣaḥ kuśalasya nāpakarṣāyālam. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:477: kuśalaṃ hi me bahv anyad asti yatrāyam āvāpaṃ gataḥ svarge 'py apakarṣam alpaṃ kariṣyati” iti.
GSP34patyogbu:478: niyatavipākapradhānakarmaṇābhibhūtasya vā ciram avasthānam. katham iti,
GSP34patyogbu:479: adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyaiva niyatavipākasya karmaṇaḥ samānaṃ maraṇam abhivyaktikāraṇam
GSP34patyogbu:480: uktam. na tv adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyāniyatavipākasya. yat tv adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaṃ karmāniyatavipākaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:481: tan naśyed āvāpaṃ vā gacched abhibhūtaṃ vā ciram apy upāsīta,
GSP34patyogbu:482: yāvat samānaṃ karmābhivyañjakaṃ nimittam asya na vipākābhimukhaṃ karotīti. tadvipākasyaiva
GSP34patyogbu:483: deśakālanimittānavadhāraṇād iyaṃ karmagatiś citrā durvijñānā ceti. na cotsargasyāpavādān
GSP34patyogbu:486: te janmāyurbhogāḥ puṇyahetukāḥ sukhaphalā apuṇyahetukā duḥkhaphalā iti. yathā cedaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratikūlātmakam evaṃ viṣayasukhakāle 'pi duḥkham asty eva pratikūlātmakaṃ yoginaḥ. 2.14
GSP34patyogbu:488: pariṇāmatāpasaṃskāraduḥkhair guṇavṛttivirodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ // YS_2.15 //
GSP34patyogbu:489: sarvasyāyaṃ rāgānuviddhaś cetanācetanasādhanādhīnaḥ sukhānubhava iti tatrāsti rāgajaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:490: karmāśayaḥ. tathā ca dveṣṭi duḥkhasādhanāni muhyati ceti dveṣamohakṛto 'py asti karmāśayaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:491: tathā coktam --- “nānupahatya bhūtāny upabhogaḥ saṃbhavatīti hiṃsākṛto 'py asti śarīraḥ
GSP34patyogbu:493: yā bhogeṣv indriyāṇāṃ tṛpter upaśāntis tat sukham. yā laulyād anupaśāntis tad duḥkham. na cendriyāṇāṃ bhogābhyāsena vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kartuṃ śakyam.
GSP34patyogbu:494: yato bhogābhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇām iti. tasmād anupāyaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:495: sukhasya bhogābhyāsa iti. sa khalv ayaṃ vṛścikaviṣabhīta ivāśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo yaḥ sukhārthī
GSP34patyogbu:496: viṣayānuvāsito mahati duḥkhapaṅke nimagna iti. eṣā pariṇāmaduḥkhatā nāma pratikūlā
GSP34patyogbu:499: sarvasya dveṣānuviddhaś cetanācetanasādhanādhīnas tāpānubhava iti tatrāsti dveṣajaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:500: karmāśayaḥ. sukhasādhanāni ca prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate tataḥ
GSP34patyogbu:501: param anugṛhṇāty upahanti ceti parānugrahapīḍābhyāṃ dharmādharmāv upacinoti. sa karmāśayo
GSP34patyogbu:502: lobhān mohāc ca bhavatīty eṣā tāpaduḥkhatocyate. kā punaḥ saṃskāraduḥkhatā,
GSP34patyogbu:503: sukhānubhavāt sukhasaṃskārāśayo duḥkhānubhavād api duḥkhasaṃskārāśaya iti. evaṃ karmabhyo vipāke 'nubhūyamāne sukhe duḥkhe vā punaḥ karmāśayapracaya
GSP34patyogbu:504: evam idam anādi duḥkhasroto viprasṛtaṃ yoginam eva pratikūlātmakatvād udvejayati. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:505: akṣipātrakalpo hi vidvān iti. yathorṇātantur akṣipātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati na cānyeṣu gātrāvayaveṣu,
GSP34patyogbu:506: evam etāni duḥkhāny akṣipātrakalpaṃ yoginam eva kliśnanti netaraṃ pratipattāram.
GSP34patyogbu:507: itaraṃ tu svakarmopahṛtaṃ duḥkham upāttam upāttaṃ tyajantaṃ tyaktaṃ tyaktam upādadānam
GSP34patyogbu:508: anādivāsanāvicitrayā cittavṛttyā samantato 'nuviddham ivāvidyayā hātavya evāhaṃkāramamakārānupātinaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:509: jātaṃ jātaṃ bāhyādhyātmikobhayanimittās triparvāṇas tāpā anuplavante. tad evam anādinā
GSP34patyogbu:510: duḥkhasrotasā vyuhyamānam ātmānaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā yogī sarvaduḥkhakṣayakāraṇaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:512: guṇavṛttivirodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ. prakhyāpravṛttisthitirūpā buddhiguṇāḥ
GSP34patyogbu:513: parasparānugrahatantrī bhūtvā śāntaṃ ghoraṃ mūḍhaṃ vā pratyayaṃ triguṇam evārabhante.
GSP34patyogbu:514: calaṃ ca guṇavṛttam iti kṣiprapariṇāmi cittam uktam. rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāś ca
GSP34patyogbu:516: sāmānyāni tv atiśayaiḥ saha pravartante. evam ete guṇā itaretarāśrayeṇopārjitasukhaduḥkhamohapratyayāḥ sarve sarvarūpā bhavantīti,
GSP34patyogbu:517: guṇapradhānabhāvakṛtas tv eṣāṃ viśeṣa iti. tasmād duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekina iti.
GSP34patyogbu:518: tad asya mahato duḥkhasamudāyasya prabhavabījam avidyā. tasyāś ca samyagdarśanam
GSP34patyogbu:519: abhāvahetuḥ. yathā cikitsāśāstraṃ caturvyūham --- rogo rogahetur ārogyaṃ bhaiṣajyam
GSP34patyogbu:520: iti. evam idam api śāstram caturvyūham eva. tadyathā --- saṃsāraḥ saṃsārahetur mokṣo
GSP34patyogbu:521: mokṣopāya iti. tatra duḥkhabahulaḥ saṃsāro heyaḥ. pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṃyogo heyahetuḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:523: tatra hātuḥ svarūpam upādeyaṃ vā heyaṃ vā na bhavitum arhatīti hāne tasyocchedavādaprasaṅga upādāne ca hetuvādaḥ. ubhayapratyākhyāne śāśvatavāda ity etat samyagdarśanam. 2.15
GSP34patyogbu:524: tad etac chāstraṃ caturvyūham ity abhidhīyate ---
GSP34patyogbu:526: duḥkham atītam upabhogenātivāhitaṃ na heyapakṣe vartate. vartamānaṃ ca svakṣaṇe bhogārūḍham
GSP34patyogbu:527: iti na tat kṣaṇāntare heyatām āpadyate. tasmād yad evānāgataṃ duḥkhaṃ tad evākṣipātrakalpaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:528: yoginaṃ kliśnāti netaraṃ pratipattāram. tad eva heyatām āpadyate. 2.16
GSP34patyogbu:529: tasmād yad eva heyam ity ucyate tasyaiva kāraṇaṃ pratinirdiśyate ---
GSP34patyogbu:531: draṣṭā buddheḥ pratisaṃvedī puruṣaḥ. dṛśyā buddhisattvopārūḍhāḥ sarve dharmāḥ. tad
GSP34patyogbu:532: etad dṛśyam ayaskāntamaṇikalpaṃ saṃnidhimātropakāri dṛśyatvena svaṃ bhavati puruṣasya
GSP34patyogbu:534: anubhavakarmaviṣayatām āpannaṃ yataḥ. anyasvarūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakaṃ svatantram api parārthatvāt paratantram.
GSP34patyogbu:535: tayor dṛgdarśanaśaktyor anādir arthakṛtaḥ saṃyogo heyahetur duḥkhasya kāraṇam ity arthaḥ. tathā coktam --- tatsaṃyogahetuvivarjanāt syād ayam ātyantiko duḥkhapratīkāraḥ. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:536: duḥkhahetoḥ parihāryasya pratīkāradarśanāt. tadyathā --- pādatalasya bhedyatā,
GSP34patyogbu:540: etat trayaṃ yo veda loke sa tatra pratīkāram ārabhamāṇo bhedajaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāpnoti. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:541: tritvopalabdhisāmarthyād iti. atrāpi tāpakasya rajasaḥ sattvam eva tapyam. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:543: sattve karmaṇi tapikriyā nāpariṇāmini niṣkriye kṣetrajñe,
GSP34patyogbu:544: darśitaviṣayatvāt. sattve tu tapyamāne tadākārānurodhī puruṣo 'py anutapyata iti. 2.17
GSP34patyogbu:547: prakāśaśīlaṃ sattvam. kriyāśīlaṃ rajaḥ sthitiśīlaṃ tama iti. ete guṇāḥ parasparoparaktapravibhāgāḥ
GSP34patyogbu:550: upadarśitasaṃnidhānā guṇatve 'pi ca vyāpāramātreṇa pradhānāntarṇītānumitāstitāḥ puruṣārthakartavyatayā
GSP34patyogbu:552: vṛttim anuvartamānāḥ pradhānaśabdavācyā bhavanti. etad dṛśyam ity ucyate.

GSP34patyogbu:556: avibhāgāpannaṃ bhogo bhoktuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇam apavarga iti. dvayor atiriktam anyad
GSP34patyogbu:557: darśanaṃ nāsti. tathā coktam --- ayaṃ tu khalu triṣu guṇeṣu kartṛṣv akartari ca puruṣe
GSP34patyogbu:558: tulyātulyajātīye caturthe tatkriyāsākṣiṇy upanīyamānān sarvabhāvān upapannān anupaśyann
GSP34patyogbu:560: tāv etau bhogāpavargau buddhikṛtau buddhāv eva vartamānau kathaṃ puruṣe vyapadiśyete iti. yathā vijayaḥ parājayo vā yoddhṛṣu vartamānaḥ svāmini
GSP34patyogbu:562: evaṃ bandhamokṣau buddhāv eva vartamānau puruṣe vyapadiśyete,
GSP34patyogbu:563: sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti. buddher eva puruṣārthāparisamāptir bandhas tadarthāvasāyo
GSP34patyogbu:564: mokṣa iti. etena grahaṇadhāraṇohāpohatattvajñānābhiniveśā buddhau vartamānāḥ puruṣe
GSP34patyogbu:568: tatrākāśavāyvagnyudakabhūmayo bhūtāni śabdasparśarūparasagandhatanmātrāṇām aviśeṣāṇāṃ viśeṣāḥ. tathā śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇāni buddhīndriyāṇi,
GSP34patyogbu:571: ity etāny asmitālakṣaṇasyāviśeṣasya viśeṣāḥ. guṇānām eṣa ṣoḍaśako viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:572: ṣaḍ aviśeṣāḥ. tadyathā --- śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rūpatanmātraṃ rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātraṃ ceti ekadvitricatuḥpañcalakṣaṇāḥ śabdādayaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:573: ṣaṣṭhaś cāviśeṣo 'smitāmātra iti. ete sattāmātrasyātmano mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣapariṇāmāḥ.

GSP34patyogbu:579: aliṅgāvasthāyāṃ na puruṣārtho hetur nāliṅgāvasthāyām ādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP34patyogbu:580: na tasyāḥ puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti. nāsau puruṣārthakṛteti nityākhyāyate. trayāṇāṃ
GSP34patyogbu:581: tv avasthāviśeṣāṇām ādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṃ bhavati. sa cārtho hetur nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:582: bhavatīty anityākhyāyate. guṇās tu sarvadharmānupātino na pratyastam ayante nopajāyante.
GSP34patyogbu:584: pratyavabhāsante. yathā devadatto daridrāti. kasmāt yato 'sya mriyante gāva iti,
GSP34patyogbu:585: gavām eva maraṇāt tasya daridrāṇaṃ na svarūpahānād iti samaḥ samādhiḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:587: tatra tat saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vivicyate kramān ativṛttayaḥ. tathā ṣaḍ aviśeṣā liṅgamātre saṃsṛṣṭā
GSP34patyogbu:588: vivicyante pariṇāmakramaniyamāt. tathā teṣv aviśeṣeṣu bhūtendriyāṇi saṃsṛṣṭāni vivicyante.
GSP34patyogbu:589: tathā coktaṃ purastāt. na viśeṣebhyaḥ paraṃ tattvāntaram astīti viśeṣāṇāṃ nāsti tattvāntarapariṇāmaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:591: vyākhyātaṃ dṛśyam atha draṣṭuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇārtham idam ārabhyate ---
GSP34patyogbu:593: dṛśimātra iti dṛkśaktir eva viśeṣaṇāparāmṛṣṭety arthaḥ. sa puruṣo bhuddheḥ pratisaṃvedī.
GSP34patyogbu:594: sa buddher na sarūpo nātyantaṃ virūpa iti. na tāvat sarūpaḥ kasmāt. jñātājñātaviṣayatvāt
GSP34patyogbu:595: pariṇāminī hi buddhiḥ. tasyāś ca viṣayo gavādir ghaṭādir vā jñātaś cājñātaś ceti
GSP34patyogbu:597: sadājñātaviṣayatvaṃ tu puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvaṃ paridīpayati kasmāt. na hi buddhiś ca
GSP34patyogbu:598: nāma puruṣaviṣayaś ca syād agṛhītā gṛhītā ceti siddhaṃ puruṣasya sadājñātaviṣayatvaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:599: tataś cāpariṇāmitvam iti. kiṃ ca parārthā buddhiḥ saṃhatyakāritvāt,
GSP34patyogbu:600: svārthaḥ puruṣa iti. tathā sarvārthādhyavasāyakatvāt triguṇā buddhis triguṇatvād acetaneti. guṇānāṃ tūpadraṣṭā puruṣa ity ato na sarūpaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:601: astu tarhi virūpa iti. nātyantaṃ virūpaḥ kasmāt. śuddho 'py asau pratyayānupaśyo yataḥ. pratyayaṃ bauddham anupaśyati,
GSP34patyogbu:602: tam anupaśyann atadātmāpi tadātmaka iva pratyavabhāsate. tathā coktam --- apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktir apratisaṃkramā ca pariṇāminy arthe pratisaṃkrānteva tadvṛttim anupatati,
GSP34patyogbu:603: tasyāś ca prāptacaitanyopagraharūpāyā buddhivṛtter anukāramātratayā buddhivṛttyaviśiṣṭā hi jñānavṛttir ity ākhyāyate. 2.20

GSP34patyogbu:617: puruṣaḥ svāmī dṛśyena svena darśanārthaṃ saṃyuktaḥ. tasmāt saṃyogād dṛśyasyopalabdhir

GSP34patyogbu:619: iti darśanaṃ viyogasya kāraṇam uktam. darśanam adarśanasya pratidvandvīty adarśanaṃ

GSP34patyogbu:650: heyaṃ duḥkhaṃ heyakāraṇaṃ ca saṃyogākhyaṃ sanimittam uktam ataḥ paraṃ hānaṃ vaktavyam ---

GSP34patyogbu:679: jñānasyāpi dīptir vivardhate. sā khalv eṣā vivṛddhiḥ prakarṣam anubhavatyā vivekakhyāteḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:680: ā guṇapuruṣasvarūpavijñānād ity arthaḥ. yogāṅgānuṣṭhānam aśuddher viyogakāraṇam.

GSP34patyogbu:916: yathaikā rekhā śatasthāne śataṃ daśasthāne daśaikā caikasthāne yathā caikatve 'pi
GSP34patyogbu:917: strī mātā cocyate duhitā ca svasā ceti.
GSP34patyogbu:918: avasthāpariṇāme kauṭasthyaprasaṅgadoṣaḥ kaiścid uktaḥ. katham. adhvano vyāpāreṇa
GSP34patyogbu:919: vyavahitatvāt. yadā dharmaḥ svavyāpāraṃ na karoti tadānāgato yadā karoti tadā vartamāno
GSP34patyogbu:920: yadā kṛtvā nivṛttas tadātīta ity evaṃ dharmadharmiṇor lakṣaṇānām avasthānāṃ ca kauṭasthyaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:922: nāsau doṣaḥ. kasmāt. guṇinityatve 'pi guṇānāṃ vimardavaicitryāt. yathā saṃsthānam
GSP34patyogbu:923: ādimad dharmamātraṃ śabdādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ vināśyavināśinām evaṃ liṅgam ādimad dharmamātraṃ
GSP34patyogbu:925: tatredam udāharaṇaṃ mṛddharmī piṇḍākārād dharmād dharmāntaram upasaṃpadyamāno dharmataḥ
GSP34patyogbu:926: pariṇamate ghaṭākāra iti. ghaṭākāro 'nāgataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hitvā vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipadyata
GSP34patyogbu:927: iti lakṣaṇataḥ pariṇamate. ghaṭo navapurāṇatāṃ pratikṣaṇam anubhavann avasthāpariṇāmaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:928: pratipadyata iti. dharmiṇo 'pi dharmāntaram avasthā dharmasyāpi lakṣaṇāntaram avasthety
GSP34patyogbu:929: eka eva dravyapariṇāmo bhedenopadarśita iti. evaṃ padārthāntareṣv api yojyam iti.
GSP34patyogbu:930: ta ete dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā dharmisvarūpam anatikrāntā ity eka eva pariṇāmaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:931: sarvān amūn viśeṣān abhiplavate. atha ko 'yaṃ pariṇāmaḥ.avasthitasya dravyasya pūrvadharmanivṛttau
GSP34patyogbu:935: yogyatāvacchinnā dharmiṇaḥ śaktir eva dharmaḥ. sa ca phalaprasavabhedānumita ekasyānyo
GSP34patyogbu:936: 'nyaś ca paridṛṣṭaḥ. tatra vartamānaḥ svavyāpāram anubhavan dharmī dharmāntarebhyaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:937: śāntebhyaś cāvyapadeśyebhyaś ca bhidyate. yadā tu sāmānyena samanvāgato bhavati tadā
GSP34patyogbu:939: tatra ye khalu dharmiṇo dharmāḥ śāntā uditā avyapadeśyāś ceti,
GSP34patyogbu:940: tatra śāntā ye kṛtvā vyāpārānuparatāḥ savyāpārā uditās te cānāgatasya lakṣaṇasya samanantarā vartamānasyānantarā atītāḥ kimartham atītasyānantarā na bhavanti vartamānāḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:941: pūrvapaścimatāyā abhāvāt. yathānāgatavartamānayoḥ pūrvapaścimatā naivam atītasya. tasmān nātītasyāsti samanantaraḥ tadanāgata eva samanantaro bhavati vartamānasyeti.
GSP34patyogbu:942: athāvyapadeśyāḥ ke sarvaṃ sarvātmakam iti. yatroktam --- jalabhūmyoḥ pāriṇāmikaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:943: rasādivaiśvarūpyaṃ sthāvareṣu dṛṣṭam. tathā sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgameṣu jaṅgamānāṃ sthāvareṣv
GSP34patyogbu:944: ity evaṃ jātyanucchedena sarvaṃ sarvātmakam iti.
GSP34patyogbu:945: deśakālākāranimittāpabandhān na khalu samānakālam ātmanām abhivyaktir iti. ya eteṣv
GSP34patyogbu:946: abhivyaktānabhivyakteṣu dharmeṣv anupātī sāmānyaviśeṣātmā so 'nvayī dharmī. yasya
GSP34patyogbu:947: tu dharmamātram evedaṃ niranvayaṃ tasya bhogābhāvaḥ. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:948: anyena vijñānena kṛtasya karmaṇo 'nyat kathaṃ bhoktṛtvenādhikriyate. tatsmṛtyabhāvaś
GSP34patyogbu:949: ca nānyadṛṣṭasya smaraṇam anyasyāstīti. vastupratyabhijñānāc ca sthito 'nvayī dharmī
GSP34patyogbu:950: yo dharmānyathātvam abhyupagataḥ pratyabhijñāyate tasmān nedaṃ dharmamātraṃ niranvayam iti. 3.14
GSP34patyogbu:952: ekasya dharmiṇa eka eva pariṇāma iti prasakte kramānyatvaṃ pariṇāmānyatve hetur bhavatīti.
GSP34patyogbu:953: tadyathā cūrṇamṛtpiṇḍamṛdghaṭamṛtkapālamṛtkaṇamṛd iti ca kramaḥ. yo yasya dharmasya
GSP34patyogbu:954: samanantaro dharmaḥ sa tasya kramaḥ. piṇḍaḥ pracyavate ghaṭa upajāyata iti dharmapariṇāmakramaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:955: lakṣaṇapariṇāmakramo ghaṭasyānāgatabhāvād vartamānabhāvaḥ kramaḥ. tathā piṇḍasya
GSP34patyogbu:956: vartamānabhāvād atītabhāvaḥ kramaḥ. nātītasyāsti kramaḥ. kasmāt. pūrvaparatāyāṃ satyāṃ samanantaratvaṃ,
GSP34patyogbu:957: sā tu nāsty atītasya tasmād dvayor eva lakṣaṇayoḥ kramaḥ. tathāvasthāpariṇāmakramo
GSP34patyogbu:958: 'pi ghaṭasyābhinavasya prānte purāṇatā dṛśyate. sā ca kṣaṇaparamparānupātinā krameṇābhivyajyamānā
GSP34patyogbu:959: parāṃ vyaktim āpadyata iti. dharmalakṣaṇābhyāṃ ca viśiṣṭo 'yaṃ tṛtīyaḥ pariṇāma iti.
GSP34patyogbu:960: ta ete kramā dharmadharmibhede sati pratilabdhasvarūpāḥ. dharmo 'pi dharmī bhavaty
GSP34patyogbu:961: anyadharmasvarūpāpekṣayeti. yadā tu paramārthato dharmiṇy abhedopacāras taddvāreṇa
GSP34patyogbu:962: sa evābhidhīyate dharmas tadāyam ekatvenaiva kramaḥ pratyavabhāsate.
GSP34patyogbu:963: cittasya dvaye dharmā paridṛṣṭāś cāparidṛṣṭāś ca. tatra pratyayātmakāḥ paridṛṣṭā vastumātrātmakā aparidṛṣṭāḥ. te ca saptaiva bhavanty anumānena
GSP34patyogbu:965: ceṣṭā śaktiś ca cittasya dharmā darśanavarjitāḥ //” iti. 3.15
GSP34patyogbu:966: ato yogina upāttasarvasādhanasya bubhutsitārthapratipattaye saṃyamasya viṣaya upakṣipyate ---
GSP34patyogbu:968: dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmeṣu saṃyamād yogināṃ bhavaty atītānāgatajñānam. dhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayam
GSP34patyogbu:969: ekatra saṃyama uktaḥ. tena pariṇāmatrayaṃ sākṣātkriyamāṇam atītānāgatajñānaṃ teṣu saṃpādayati. 3.16
GSP34patyogbu:970: śabdārthapratyayānām itaretarādhyāsāt saṃkaras tatpravibhāgasaṃyamāt sarvabhūtarutajñānam // YS_3.17 //
GSP34patyogbu:971: tatra vāgvarṇeṣv evārthavatī. śrotraṃ ca dhvanipariṇāmamātraviṣayam. padaṃ punar
GSP34patyogbu:973: te padam asaṃspṛśyānupasthāpyāvirbhūtās tirobhūtāś ceti pratyekam apadasvarūpā ucyante.
GSP34patyogbu:974: varṇaḥ punar ekaikaḥ padātmā sarvābhidhānaśaktipracitaḥ sahakārivarṇāntarapratiyogitvād
GSP34patyogbu:975: vaiśvarūpyam ivāpannaḥ pūrvaś cottareṇottaraś ca pūrveṇa viśeṣe 'vasthāpita ity evaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:976: bahavo varṇāḥ kramānurodhino 'rthasaṃketenāvacchinnā iyanta ete sarvābhidhānaśaktiparivṛtā
GSP34patyogbu:978: tad eteṣām arthasaṃketenāvacchinnānām upasaṃhṛtadhvanikramāṇāṃ ya eko buddhinirbhāsas
GSP34patyogbu:979: tatpadaṃ vācakaṃ vācyasya saṃketyate. tad ekaṃ padam ekabuddhiviṣaya ekaprayatnākṣiptam
GSP34patyogbu:980: abhāgam akramam avarṇaṃ bauddham antyavarṇapratyayavyāpāropasthāpitaṃ paratra pratipipādayiṣayā
GSP34patyogbu:981: varṇair evābhidhīyamānaiḥ śrūyamāṇaiś ca śrotṛbhir anādivāgvyavahāravāsanānuviddhayā
GSP34patyogbu:983: tasya saṃketabuddhitaḥ pravibhāga etāvatām evaṃjātīyako 'nusaṃhāra ekasyārthasya
GSP34patyogbu:984: vācaka iti. saṃketas tu padapadārthayor itaretarādhyāsarūpaḥ smṛtyātmako yo 'yaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:985: śabdaḥ so 'yam artho yo 'yam arthaḥ so 'yaṃ śabda iti. evam itaretarādhyāsarūpaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:986: saṃketo bhavatīti. evam ete śabdārthapratyayā itaretarādhyāsāt saṃkīrṇā gaur iti
GSP34patyogbu:987: śabdo gaur ity artho gaur iti jñānam. ya eṣāṃ pravibhāgajñaḥ sa sarvavit.
GSP34patyogbu:988: sarvapadeṣu cāsti vākyaśaktivṛkṣa ity ukte 'stīti gamyate. na sattāṃ padārtho vyabhicaratīti. tathā na hy asādhanā kriyāstīti.
GSP34patyogbu:989: tathā ca pacatīty ukte sarvakārakāṇām ākṣepo niyamārtho 'nuvādaḥ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṃ caitrāgnitaṇḍulānām iti. dṛṣṭaṃ ca vākyārthe padaracanaṃ śrotriyaś chando 'dhīte,
GSP34patyogbu:990: jīvati prāṇān dhārayati. tatra vākye padārthābhivyaktis tataḥ padaṃ pravibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:991: kriyāvācakaṃ vā kārakavācakaṃ vā. anyathā bhavaty aśvo 'jāpaya ity evamādiṣu nāmākhyātasārūpyād
GSP34patyogbu:992: anirjñātaṃ kathaṃ kriyāyāṃ kārake vā vyākriyeteti.
GSP34patyogbu:993: teṣāṃ śabdārthapratyayānāṃ pravibhāgaḥ. tadyathā śvetate prāsāda iti kriyārthaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:995: kriyākārakātmā tadarthaḥ pratyayaś ca. kasmāt so 'yam ity abhisaṃbandhād ekākāra eva pratyayaḥ saṃketa iti.
GSP34patyogbu:996: yas tu śveto 'rthaḥ sa śabdapratyayayor ālambanībhūtaḥ. sa hi svābhir avasthābhir
GSP34patyogbu:997: vikriyamāṇo na śabdasahagato na buddhisahagataḥ. evaṃ śabda evaṃ pratyayo netaretarasahagata
GSP34patyogbu:998: ity anyathā śabdo 'nyathārtho 'nyathā pratyaya iti vibhāgaḥ. evaṃ tatpravibhāgasaṃyamād
GSP34patyogbu:1001: dvaye khalv amī saṃskārāḥ smṛtikleśahetavo vāsanārūpā vipākahetavo dharmādharmarūpāḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:1003: teṣu saṃyamaḥ saṃskārasākṣātkriyāyai samarthaḥ. na ca deśakālanimittānubhavair vinā
GSP34patyogbu:1004: teṣām asti sākṣātkaraṇam. tad itthaṃ saṃskārasākṣātkaraṇāt pūrvajātijñānam utpadyate
GSP34patyogbu:1005: yoginaḥ. paratrāpy evam eva saṃskārasākṣātkaraṇāt parajātisaṃvedanam.
GSP34patyogbu:1006: atredam ākhyānaṃ śrūyate --- bhagavato jaigīṣavyasya saṃskārasākṣātkaraṇād daśasu
GSP34patyogbu:1007: mahāsargeṣu janmapariṇāmakramam anupaśyato vivekajaṃ jñānaṃ prādurabhūt. atha bhagavān
GSP34patyogbu:1008: āvaṭyas tanudharas tam uvāca --- daśasu mahāsargeṣu bhavyatvād anabhibhūtabuddhisattvena
GSP34patyogbu:1009: tvayā narakatiryaggarbhasaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃpaśyatā devamanuṣyeṣu punaḥ punar utpadyamānena
GSP34patyogbu:1010: sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kim adhikam upalabdham iti. bhagavantam āvaṭyaṃ jaigīṣavya uvāca.
GSP34patyogbu:1011: daśasu mahāsargeṣu bhavyatvād anabhibhūtabuddhisattvena mayā narakatiryagbhavaṃduḥkhaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1012: saṃpaśyatā devamanuṣyeṣu punaḥ punar utpadyamānena yat kiṃcid anubhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1013: duḥkham eva pratyavaimi. bhagavān āvaṭya uvāca. yad idam āyuṣmataḥ pradhānavaśitvam
GSP34patyogbu:1014: anuttamaṃ ca saṃtoṣasukhaṃ kim idam api duḥkhapakṣe nikṣiptam iti. bhavagāñ jaigīṣavya
GSP34patyogbu:1015: uvāca --- viṣayasukhāpekṣayaivedam anuttamaṃ saṃtoṣasukham uktam. kaivalyasukhāpekṣayā
GSP34patyogbu:1016: duḥkham eva. buddhisattvasyāyaṃ dharmas triguṇas triguṇaś ca pratyayo heyapakṣe nyasta
GSP34patyogbu:1017: iti. duḥkharūpas tṛṣṇātantuḥ. tṛṣṇāduḥkhasaṃtāpāpagamāt tu prasannam abādhaṃ sarvānukūlaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1020: pratyaye saṃyamāt pratyayasya sākṣātkaraṇāt tataḥ paracittajñānam. 3.19
GSP34patyogbu:1021: na ca tat sālambanaṃ tasyāviṣayībhūtatvāt // YS_3.20 //
GSP34patyogbu:1022: raktaṃ pratyayaṃ jānāty amuṣminn ālambane raktam iti na jānāti. parapratyayasya yad
GSP34patyogbu:1023: ālambanaṃ tad yogicittena nālambanīkṛtaṃ parapratyayamātraṃ tu yogicittasyālambanībhūtam iti. 3.20
GSP34patyogbu:1025: kāyasya rūpe saṃyamād rūpasya yā grāhyā śaktis tāṃ pratiṣṭabhnāti. grāhyaśaktistambhe
GSP34patyogbu:1026: sati cakṣuṣprakāśāsaṃprayoge 'ntardhānam utpadyate yoginaḥ. etena śabdādyantardhānam
GSP34patyogbu:1028: sopakramaṃ nirupakramaṃ ca karma tatsaṃyamād aparāntajñānam ariṣṭebhyo vā // YS_3.22 //
GSP34patyogbu:1029: āyurvipākaṃ karma dvividhaṃ sopakramaṃ nirupakramaṃ ca. tatra yathārdraṃ vastraṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1030: vitānitaṃ laghīyasā kālena śuṣyet tathā sopakramam. yathā ca tad eva saṃpiṇḍitaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1031: cireṇa saṃśuṣyed evaṃ nirupakramam. yathā vāgniḥ śuṣke kakṣe mukto vātena samantato
GSP34patyogbu:1032: yuktaḥ kṣepīyasā kālena dahet tathā sopakramam. yathā vā sa evāgnis tṛṇarāśau kramaśo
GSP34patyogbu:1033: 'vayaveṣu nyastaś cireṇa dahet tathā nirupakramam. tadaikabhavikam āyuṣkaraṃ karma
GSP34patyogbu:1034: dvividhaṃ sopakramaṃ nirupakramaṃ ca. tatsaṃyamād aparāntasya prāyaṇasya jñānam.
GSP34patyogbu:1035: ariṣṭebhyo veti trividham ariṣṭam ādhyātmikam ādhibhautikam ādhidaivikaṃ ceti. tatrādhyātmikaṃ ghoṣaṃ svadehe pihitakarṇo na śṛṇoti,
GSP34patyogbu:1036: jyotir vā netre 'vaṣṭabdhe na paśyati. tathādhibhautikaṃ yamapuruṣān paśyati,
GSP34patyogbu:1037: pitṝn atītān akasmāt paśyati. tathādhidaivikaṃ svargam akasmāt siddhān vā paśyati. viparītaṃ vā sarvam iti anena vā jānāty aparāntam upasthitam iti. 3.22
GSP34patyogbu:1039: maitrī karuṇā muditeti tisro bhāvanās tatra bhūteṣu sukhiteṣu maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā
GSP34patyogbu:1040: maitrībalaṃ labhate. duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayitvā karuṇābalaṃ labhate. puṇyaśīleṣu
GSP34patyogbu:1041: muditāṃ bhāvayitvā muditābalaṃ labhate. bhāvanātaḥ samādhir yaḥ sa saṃyamas tato
GSP34patyogbu:1042: balāny avandhyavīryāṇi jāyante. pāpaśīleṣūpekṣā na tu bhāvanā. tataś ca tasyāṃ nāsti
GSP34patyogbu:1043: samādhir ity ato na balam upekṣātas tatra saṃyamābhāvād iti. 3.23
GSP34patyogbu:1045: hastibale saṃyamād dhastibalo bhavati.vainateyabale saṃyamād vainateyabalo bhavati. vāyubale saṃyamād vāyubalo bhavatīty evamādi. 3.24
GSP34patyogbu:1047: jyotiṣmatī pravṛttir uktā manasas tasyā ya ālokas taṃ yogī sūkṣme vā vyavahite vā viprakṛṣṭe vārthe vinyasya tam artham adhigacchati. 3.25
GSP34patyogbu:1049: tatprastāraḥ sapta lokāḥ. tatrāvīceḥ prabhṛti merupṛṣṭhaṃ yāvad ity evaṃ bhūrlokaḥ.
GSP34patyogbu:1050: merupṛṣṭhād ārabhya --- ādhruvād grahanakṣatratārāvicitro 'ntarikṣalokaḥ. tataḥ paraḥ
GSP34patyogbu:1051: svarlokaḥ pañcavidho māhendras tṛtīyo lokaḥ. caturthaḥ prājāpatyo maharlokaḥ. trividho
GSP34patyogbu:1052: brāhmaḥ tadyathā --- janalokas tapolokaḥ satyaloka iti.
GSP34patyogbu:1054: māhendraś ca svar ity ukto divi tārā bhuvi prajāḥ //“
GSP34patyogbu:1056: tatrāvīcer upary upari niviṣṭāḥ ṣaṇmahānarakabhūmayo ghanasalilānalānilākāśatamaḥpratiṣṭhā
GSP34patyogbu:1058: prāṇinaḥ kaṣṭam āyur dīrgham ākṣipya jāyante. tato mahātalarasātalātalasutalavitalatalātalapātālākhyāni
GSP34patyogbu:1059: sapta pātālāni. bhūmir iyam aṣṭamī saptadvīpā vasumatī,
GSP34patyogbu:1060: yasyāḥ sumerur madhye parvatarājaḥ kāñcanaḥ. tasya rājatavaidūryasphaṭikahemamaṇimayāni śṛṅgāṇi. tatra vaidūryaprabhānurāgān nīlotpalapatraśyāmo nabhaso dakṣiṇo bhāgaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:1063: kuraṇṭakābha uttaraḥ. dakṣiṇapārśve cāsya jambūr yato 'yaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ. tasya sūryapracārād
GSP34patyogbu:1064: rātriṃdivaṃ lagnam iva vartate. tasya nīlaśvetaśṛṅgavanta udīcīnās trayaḥ parvatā
GSP34patyogbu:1065: dvisāhasrāyāmāḥ. tadantareṣu trīṇi varṣāṇi nava nava yojanasāhasrāṇi ramaṇakaṃ hiraṇmayam
GSP34patyogbu:1066: uttarāḥ kurava iti. niṣadhahemakūṭahimaśailā dakṣiṇato dvisāhasrāyāmāḥ. tadantareṣu
GSP34patyogbu:1067: trīṇi varṣāṇi nava nava yojanasāhasrāṇi harivarṣaṃ kiṃpuruṣaṃ bhāratam iti. sumeroḥ

GSP34patyogbu:1411: na syur evaṃ nāsti pṛṣṭham ity udaram api na gṛhyeta. tasmāt svatantro 'rthaḥ sarvapuruṣasādhāraṇaḥ

GSP34patyogbu:1415: ca viṣayeṇoparaktaṃ cittaṃ sa viṣayo jñātas tato 'nyaḥ punar ajñātaḥ vastuno jñātājñātasvarūpatvāt
GSP34patyogbu:1417: yasya tu tad eva cittaṃ viṣayas tasya ---

GSP34patyogbu:1419: yadi cittavat prabhur api puruṣaḥ pariṇamet tatas tadviṣayāś cittavṛttayaḥ śabdādiviṣayavaj
GSP34patyogbu:1420: jñātājñātāḥ syuḥ sadājñātatvaṃ tu manasas tatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvam anumāpayati. 4.18

GSP34patyogbu:1427: na parapratiṣṭham ity arthaḥ svabuddhipracārapratisaṃvedanāt sattvānāṃ pravṛttir
GSP34patyogbu:1428: dṛśyate --- kruddho 'haṃ bhīto 'ham amutra me rāgo 'mutra me krodha iti etat svabuddher
GSP34patyogbu:1432: kṣaṇikavādino yad bhavanaṃ saiva kriyā tad eva ca kārakam ity abhyupagamaḥ. 4.20

GSP34patyogbu:1435: atha cittaṃ cec cittāntareṇa gṛhyeta buddhibuddhiḥ kena gṛhyate,
GSP34patyogbu:1436: sāpy anyayā sāpy anyayety atiprasaṅgaḥ. smṛtisaṃkaraś ca,
GSP34patyogbu:1437: yāvanto buddhibuddhīnām anubhavās tāvatyaḥ smṛtayaḥ prāpnuvanti. tatsaṃkarāc caikasmṛtyanavadhāraṇaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1438: ca syād ity evaṃ buddhipratisaṃvedinaṃ puruṣam apalapadbhir vaināśikaiḥ sarvam evākulīkṛtam.

GSP34patyogbu:1442: praśāntaye guror antike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmīty uktvā sattvasya punaḥ sattvam evāpahnuvate.
GSP34patyogbu:1443: sāṃkhyayogādayas tu pravādāḥ svaśabdena puruṣam eva svāminaṃ cittasya bhoktāram upayantīti. 4.21

GSP34patyogbu:1448: buddhivṛttyaviśiṣṭā hi jñānavṛttir ākhyāyate. tathā coktam.

GSP34patyogbu:1450: guhā yasyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma śāśvataṃ buddhivṛttim aviśiṣṭāṃ kavayo vedayante” iti. 4.22

GSP34patyogbu:1456: viṣayātmakam apy aviṣayātmakam ivācetanaṃ cetanam iva sphaṭikamaṇikalpaṃ sarvārtham ity ucyate.
GSP34patyogbu:1457: tad anena cittasārūpyeṇa bhrāntāḥ kecit tad eva cetanam ity āhuḥ apare cittamātram evedaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti khalv ayaṃ gavādir ghaṭādiś ca sakāraṇo loka iti. anukampanīyās te. kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:1458: asti hi teṣāṃ bhrāntibījaṃ sarvarūpākāranirbhāsaṃ cittam iti. samādhiprajñāyāṃ prajñeyo
GSP34patyogbu:1459: 'rthaḥ pratibimbībhūtas tasyālambanībhūtatvād anyaḥ. sa ced arthaś cittamātraṃ syāt
GSP34patyogbu:1460: kathaṃ prajñayaiva prajñārūpam avadhāryeta. tasmāt pratibimbībhūto 'rthaḥ prajñāyāṃ

GSP34patyogbu:1462: apy etaj jātitaḥ pravibhajante te samyagdarśinas tair adhigataḥ puruṣaḥ. 4.23
GSP34patyogbu:1464: tad asaṃkhyeyavāsanābhiś citram api parārthaṃ saṃhatyakāritvāt // YS_4.24 //

GSP34patyogbu:1466: na svārthaṃ saṃhatyakāritvād gṛhavat. saṃhatyakāriṇā cittena na svārthena bhavitavyaṃ,
GSP34patyogbu:1467: na sukhacittaṃ sukhārthaṃ na jñānaṃ jñānārtham ubhayam apy etat parārtham. yaś ca
GSP34patyogbu:1468: bhogenāpavargeṇa cārthenārthavān puruṣaḥ sa eva paro na paraḥ sāmānyamātram. yat
GSP34patyogbu:1469: tu kiṃcit paraṃ sāmānyamātraṃ svarūpeṇodāhared vaināśikas tat sarvaṃ saṃhatyakāritvāt
GSP34patyogbu:1470: parārtham eva syāt. yas tv asau paro viśeṣaḥ sa na saṃhatyakārī puruṣa iti. 4.24

GSP34patyogbu:1474: karmābhinirvartitam ity anumīyate. tasyātmabhāvabhāvanā svābhāvikī pravartate yasyābhāvād
GSP34patyogbu:1475: idam uktaṃ svabhāvaṃ muktvā doṣādyeṣāṃ pūrvapakṣe rucir bhavaty aruciś ca nirṇaye
GSP34patyogbu:1476: bhavati tatrātmabhāvabhāvanā ko 'ham āsaṃ katham aham āsaṃ kiṃsvid idaṃ kathaṃsvid
GSP34patyogbu:1477: idaṃ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ vā bhaviṣyāma iti. sā tu viśeṣadarśino nivartate kutaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:1479: puruṣas tv asatyām avidyāyāṃ śuddhaś cittadharmair aparāmṛṣṭa iti. tato 'syātmabhāvabhāvanā kuśalasya nivartata iti. 4.25
GSP34patyogbu:1481: tadānīṃ yad asya cittaṃ viṣayaprāgbhāram ajñānanimnam āsīt tad asyānyathā bhavati kaivalyaprāgbhāraṃ vivekajajñānanimnam iti. 4.26
GSP34patyogbu:1483: pratyayavivekanimnasya sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātrapravāhiṇaś cittasya tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇy asmīti vā mameti vā jānāmīti vā na jānāmīti vā. kutaḥ,
GSP34patyogbu:1486: yathā kleśā dagdhabījabhāvā na prarohasamarthā bhavanti tathā jñānāgninā dagdhabījabhāvaḥ
GSP34patyogbu:1487: pūrvasaṃskāro na pratyayaprasūr bhavati. jñānasaṃskārās tu cittādhikārasamāptim anuśerata

GSP34patyogbu:1490: yadāyaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ prasaṃkhyāne 'py akusīdas tato 'pi na kiṃcit prārthayate. tatrāpi
GSP34patyogbu:1491: viraktasya sarvathā vivekakhyātir eva bhavatīti saṃskārabījakṣayān nāsya pratyayāntarāṇy
GSP34patyogbu:1492: utpadyante tadāsya dharmamegho nāma samādhir bhavati. 4.29
GSP34patyogbu:1494: tallābhād avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā bhavanti kuśalākuśalāś ca karmāśayāḥ samūlaghātaṃ hatā bhavanti. kleśakarmanivṛttau jīvann eva vidvān vimukto bhavati kasmāt,
GSP34patyogbu:1495: yasmād viparyayo bhavasya kāraṇam. na hi kṣīṇaviparyayaḥ kaścit kenacit kvacij jāto dṛśyata iti. 4.30
GSP34patyogbu:1496: tadā sarvāvaraṇamalāpetasya jñānasyānantyāj jñeyam alpam // YS_4.31 //
GSP34patyogbu:1497: sarvaiḥ kleśakarmāvaraṇair vimuktasya jñānasyānantyaṃ bhavati. āvarakeṇa tamasābhibhūtam
GSP34patyogbu:1498: āvṛtam anantaṃ jñānasattvaṃ kvacid eva rajasā pravartitam udghāṭitaṃ grahaṇasamarthaṃ
GSP34patyogbu:1499: bhavati. tatra yadā sarvair āvaraṇamalair apagataṃ bhavati tadā bhavaty asyānantyam.
GSP34patyogbu:1500: jñānasyānantyāj jñeyam alpaṃ saṃpadyate yathākāśe khadyotaḥ. yatredam uktam ---

GSP34patyogbu:1517: evaṃ paripṛṣṭe vibhajya vacanīyaḥ praśnaḥ paśūn adhikṛtya śreyasī devān ṛṣīṃś cādhikṛtya
GSP34patyogbu:1518: neti. ayaṃ tv avacanīyaḥ praśnaḥ saṃsāro 'yam antavān athānanta iti. kuśalasyāsti

GSP34patyogbu:1521: puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ guṇānāṃ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyaṃ svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktir iti // YS_4.34 //
